title: $HPE Hewlett Packard Enterprise Q1 2025 Earnings Conference Call

rawLines.text: good afternoon and welcome to the first
quarter fiscal 2025 hulet Packard
Enterprise earnings conference call at
this time all participants will be in a
listen only mode we will be facilitating
a question and answer session towards
the end of the conference should you
need assistance during the call please
signal a conference specialist by
pressing the star key Follow by zero as
a reminder this conference is being

like to turn the presentation over to
your host for today's call Paul Glazer
head of investor relations please go

Glazer head of investor relations for

welcome you to our fiscal 2025 first
quarter earnings conference call with

the press release and the slide

elements of the financial information

best view of the world and our business

of jipan
networks the doj's analysis of the

we strongly believe this transaction

and Canada with increased tariffs on

in anticipation of this decision we have

impact we intend to leverage our Global

expected pending further announcements

than
